title: Bug 10403 - Project creation should confirm the bin directory can be scrubbed
description: When a user creates a new project for an existing directory structure, we should confirm that the output directory can be deleted and then rebuilt. Some users are creating projects and pointing the output folder at a bin directory which contains more than just .class files. These additional files can be rebuilt from the available .java files.
OB: When creating a new project, confirm that the output directory can be deleted and rebuilt.
EB: Confirm that the output directory can be deleted and rebuilt when creating a new project.
SR: The confirmation for the ability to delete and rebuild the output directory should be added when creating a new project.
